'' : String(v).replace(/'/g, "''"); } var query = "SELECT c.id, c.tenant_id, c.reference, c.nom, c.description, c.client_id, c.adresse_chantier, c.code_postal, c.ville, c.responsable_id, c.statut, c.date_debut, c.date_fin_prevue, c.date_fin_reelle, c.montant_marche, c.montant_facture, c.taux_avancement, c.lot_principal, c.notes, c.created_at, c.updated_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM btp_situations WHERE chantier_id = c.id) as situations_count FROM btp_chantiers c WHERE c.id = '" + esc(id) + "' AND c.tenant_id = '" + esc(tenantId) + "'"; return [{json: {query}}];
